content:
There are several transit apps and websites that can help you plan your bus route and schedule. Here are a few popular ones:

1. Google Maps (web or mobile app): Google Maps has a built-in transit feature that allows you to enter your starting and ending points and get directions using public transportation. It also provides real-time information and schedules.
2. Transit (mobile app): Transit is a popular transit app that provides real-time information and schedules for buses, trains, and subways. It's available for both iOS and Android devices.
3. Moovit (mobile app): Moovit is another transit app that provides real-time information and schedules for public transportation. It also offers route planning and live tracking features.
4. Your local transit agency's website or app: Many local transit agencies have their own websites or apps that provide schedules, routes, and trip planning tools.

You can try out a few of these options to see which one works best for you. Just enter your starting point (your home or current location) and your destination (the community theater), and the app or website will provide you with the best route and schedule options.

Let me know if you have any other questions or need further assistance!
